page.title: 13LOCKWOOD AMENITIES
page.content: Mr.Walters is the minister of{Lockwood {Baptist church.}He has been there for {11yrs.}The church building is{130yrs old. He holds{3 services a week, 1 on {Wednesday and 2 on Sunday.}On Friday there is a{drama group.}About{70 {people}are regular church goers, although he looks after{160-200 people who are members of the church. The people who go to church pay for the repairs and his salary. Twenty children go to the{Sunday school. { {The Post Office}in Lockwood is about {100yrs}old. On average there are about {40 parcels delivered a day.}The people who work at the Post Office have been there for 2\yrs. Thursday is the busiest day. They employ extra people at Christmas They receive{250 letters a week. The opening hours are 9am- 5.30pm with an hour break at 1pm.
